title: Veeraswamy: UK's oldest Indian restaurant calls on King to save it
description: Supporters of Veeraswamy, which has operated for almost 100 years, are petitioning the King to intervene.
content:
Campaigners trying to prevent the closure of the UK's oldest surviving Indian restaurant are going to take a petition to Buckingham Palace in the next few weeks, calling on King Charles III to intervene.

title: Asda has lost its mojo and has a big fight to get it back
description: The industry data suggests that despite Asda embarking on a turnaround, it has been losing ground to rivals.
content: Rain drifts across the car park of Crawley's sprawling Asda, but the gloom does little to slow the steady stream of shoppers this midweek afternoon. Parents hurry past with school bags and groceries; car boots slam shut as people load up their weekly... [9239 chars]

title: Lover, liar, predator: How we took back power from the man who controlled us
description: Shannon, Robyn, Jenni and Natalie teamed up to bring Aaron Swan to justice after decades of abuse.
content:
Jenni was a shy 16-year-old studying for her GCSEs when she fell under the spell of a stranger she met online in 2009.

title: Grammy Awards 2026: Who will win and how to watch
description: Who's performing, who will win, and everything else you need to know about the 2026 Grammy ceremony.
content:
At the ripe old age of 67, the Grammy Awards are still considered "music's biggest night".
This year's ceremony takes place in LA on Sunday, with everyone from Harry Styles to Chaka Khan due to attend.

title: Rape trial puts Norway's royal family in unwelcome glare of public
description: Marius Borg Høiby, the crown prince's blond stepson, is accused of 38 charges in a case that has attracted global interest.
content: When Marius Borg Høiby stands up in room 250 at Oslo district court on Tuesday, at the start of Norway's biggest trial in years, he will have no moral support from his closest relatives. His mother Crown Princess Mette-Marit will not be there, nor wi... [7326 chars]
